code: import React,{Component}from'react';import{withRouter}from'react-router';import Avatar from'../avatar';import{Menu,Dropdown}from'semantic-ui-react';import'./styles.css';class UserNav extends Component{render(){const _this$props=this.props,username=_this$props.username,avatar=_this$props.avatar,logout=_this$props.logout,showEditProfile=_this$props.showEditProfile,history=_this$props.history,name=_this$props.name;const myProfile=()=>{history.push("/user/".concat(username));};return React.createElement("div",{className:"userMenu"},React.createElement(Menu,{fluid:true,inverted:true,borderless:true,size:"large",className:"userMenu-menu"},React.createElement(Menu.Item,{disabled:true,className:"userMenu-avatar"},React.createElement(Avatar,{avatar:avatar})),React.createElement(Dropdown,{item:true,simple:true,text:name||username,direction:"left"},React.createElement(Dropdown.Menu,null,React.createElement(Dropdown.Item,{onClick:myProfile,icon:"user",text:"My profile"}),React.createElement(Dropdown.Item,{onClick:showEditProfile,icon:"setting",text:"Edit profile"}),React.createElement(Dropdown.Item,{onClick:logout,icon:"sign out",text:"Logout"})))));}}export default withRouter(UserNav);
